about_the_game:
From Gameplay Recordings & Long Streams to Viral Clips


Get short-form videos from your gameplay recordings & streams in a few clicks.

Powder is a Windows app that empowers gamers, content creators, and video editors to transform lengthy gameplay recordings and streams into a wealth of impactful social media clips with ease. It's short-form content creation for gamers made swift and simple. Just a few clicks to repurpose long videos into short-form content—and spend more time with the community who supports them.

KEY POINTS

  • Powder is now free for gamers and enthusiast content creators!
  • Record your gameplay sessions and audio using Powder’s native screen recorder.
  • Quickly transform long streams (Twitch, YouTube, Kick) or video files into shareable, social-ready clips in a few clicks.
  • Powder AI identifies creators' best in-stream moments—from emotionally charged moments with laughter and rage, to spikes in community chat activity, to the game-winning knock-downs, headshots, and goals.
  • Powder also has CTRL+F for short-form video. Powder transcribes every word spoken during a stream and intelligently categorizes the content, making it easy for creators to search and find specific moments, and clip those as short videos, based on keywords or topics.
  • Automatic and manual montages stitch clips together into shareable compilations with just a few clicks.
  • Optimized short videos, in horizontal or vertical format, for TikTok, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube Shorts, and more.
    Saves gamers, creators, and video editors 10+ hours per week.
